description: St. Auxentius parying before a crucifix in a wooden cabin; on a road beyond, a cart with elderly man in it pulled by 2 cows; city in distance; several groups of travellers on road
inscription:
Signature,  and Inscription

in image: Su Priuil Sumi Pont et Cae M   Io Sadeler fecit er execud. Vos in.  / Below image in black: 2 colums, two lines each in Latin separated by the number 13: Mons erat ...Deus | in pencil on sheet: 2-368
title: Portrait of Andreas Sacchi
